prompts: Create a sleek feline Pokemon that has a shiny coat and striking red accents.
Generate a graceful Pokemon that embodies elegance and agility, with a fluffy tail.
Imagine a Pokemon that prowls through urban areas, showcasing a stealthy demeanor.
Make a lovely Normal-type Pokemon with a golden hue and playful personality.
Design a Pokemon that captures the essence of luxury, with a soft fur and piercing eyes.

Give me an image of a Pokemon that blends into cityscapes, with a sleek and slender body.
